name: The Lake in the Woods
description:
It is midnight. Only the howling of the wind and the distant sounds made by animals break the silence. 

The lake reflects the dark night sky, while standing between you and the campsite. It is so close, yet so far. 

There is not much time left. Can you find your way around the lake in the woods?

Controls

Camera ZoomRight ClickCamera ToggleQShow Controls ToggleH
